languages.text: Долгие часы команда пустотного корабля делала все возможное, чтобы вырвать судно из хватки кошмарной твари. Переборки скрипели и лопались, целые отсеки теряли герметичность, а крики людей, оказавшихся наедине с варп-исчадиями, заставляли вокс-операторов седеть и сходить с ума. Наконец Навигатор инициировал аварийный выход в реальный мир — и только открытие портала из варпа заставило неизвестного агрессора отступить.

The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.
languages.original_text: Долгие часы команда пустотного корабля делала все возможное, чтобы вырвать судно из хватки кошмарной твари. Переборки скрипели и лопались, целые отсеки теряли герметичность, а крики людей, оказавшихся наедине с варп-исчадиями, заставляли вокс-операторов седеть и сходить с ума. Наконец Навигатор инициировал аварийный выход в реальный мир — и только открытие портала из варпа заставило неизвестного агрессора отступить.

traits.locale_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurized and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last Navigator engaged an emergency transition to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurized and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last Navigator engaged an emergency transition to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

At last the Navigator executed an emergency transition to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

languages.text: 虚空舰上的船员尽其所能，试图将舰船从这只恐怖生物的纠缠之中解救出来。舱壁发出了撞击与断裂的声响，所有舱室都开始减压。那些遭到抛弃，被丢向亚空间怪物的人们发出了凄惨的尖叫，几乎都要把音阵操作员逼疯了，他们的头发变得花白。到了最后，导航者紧急跳跃到了真实世界，那只正体不明的侵略者见状主动撤退了。
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰上的船员尽其所能，试图将舰船从这只恐怖生物的纠缠之中解救出来。舱壁发出了撞击与断裂的声响，所有舱室都开始减压。那些遭到抛弃，被丢向亚空间怪物的人们发出了凄惨的尖叫，几乎都要把音阵操作员逼疯了，他们的头发变得花白。到了最后，导航者紧急跳跃到了真实世界，那只正体不明的侵略者见状主动撤退了。

languages.text: La tripulación de la nave del vacío hizo todo lo que pudo para liberarla de las garras de la horrible criatura. Los muros crujían y se rompían, cámaras enteras se despresurizaban y los gritos de las personas que se quedaban solas con el engendro de la disformidad hacían que los operadores voco enloquecieran mientras su pelo se volvía gris. Al final, la Navegante ejecutó una transición de emergencia al espacio real, y solo la apertura del portal de escape hizo retroceder al agresor desconocido.
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación de la nave del vacío hizo todo lo que pudo para liberarla de las garras de la horrible criatura. Los muros crujían y se rompían, cámaras enteras se despresurizaban y los gritos de las personas que se quedaban solas con el engendro de la disformidad hacían que los operadores voco enloquecieran mientras su pelo se volvía gris. Al final, la Navegante ejecutó una transición de emergencia al espacio real, y solo la apertura del portal de escape hizo retroceder al agresor desconocido.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップのクルーは、悪夢のような生物の手から船を解放しようと全力を尽くした。壁は軋んでミシミシと音をたて、部屋が丸ごと減圧される。ワープスポーンにポツンと残された者達の悲鳴を聞いて、ヴォクスオペレーターは気が狂い、髪の毛は白髪に変わる。ついに航宙士がリアルスペースへの緊急移動を実行して、エスケープポータルの門を前に未確認の襲撃者は退却した。
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップのクルーは、悪夢のような生物の手から船を解放しようと全力を尽くした。壁は軋んでミシミシと音をたて、部屋が丸ごと減圧される。ワープスポーンにポツンと残された者達の悲鳴を聞いて、ヴォクスオペレーターは気が狂い、髪の毛は白髪に変わる。ついに航宙士がリアルスペースへの緊急移動を実行して、エスケープポータルの門を前に未確認の襲撃者は退却した。

languages.text: L'équipage fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir pour débarrasser le vaisseau de l'emprise de la créature cauchemardesque. Les cloisons se mettent à grincer et à craquer, des salles se retrouvent dépressurisées et les hurlements de ceux qui ont vu l'engeance du Warp font perdre la raison aux opérateurs-vox, leurs cheveux devenant prématurément gris. Finalement, la navigatrice effectue une transition d'urgence vers l'espace réel, et seule l'ouverture du sas d'évacuation parvient à faire reculer l'agresseur inconnu.
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir pour débarrasser le vaisseau de l'emprise de la créature cauchemardesque. Les cloisons se mettent à grincer et à craquer, des salles se retrouvent dépressurisées et les hurlements de ceux qui ont vu l'engeance du Warp font perdre la raison aux opérateurs-vox, leurs cheveux devenant prématurément gris. Finalement, la navigatrice effectue une transition d'urgence vers l'espace réel, et seule l'ouverture du sas d'évacuation parvient à faire reculer l'agresseur inconnu.

languages.text: Die Crew des Raumschiffs tat, was sie konnte, um sich aus den Klauen der albtraumhaften Kreatur zu befreien. Die Schotten ächzten und rissen, in ganzen Kammern kam es zum Druckverlust, und die Schreie der Leute, die dem Warpmonster ausgeliefert waren, ließen das Vox-Personal graue Haare bekommen und den Verstand verlieren. Schließlich konnte die Navigatorin einen Notfallübertritt in den Realraum durchführen, und der unbekannte Aggressor zog sich nur aufgrund der Öffnung des Fluchtportals zurück.
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. Schließlich konnte die Navigatorin einen Notfallübergang in den Realraum durchführen, und der unbekannte Aggressor zog sich nur aufgrund der Öffnung des Fluchtportals zurück.

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisi mürettebatı, gemiyi kâbusvari yaratığın pençesinden kurtarmak için ellerinden geleni yaptı. Bölme panelleri inleyip çatırdadı, bazı bölmeler basınç kaybetti ve öte yaratıklarıyla karşı karşıya kalan insanların çığlıkları, voksyayar operatörlerinin aklını kaybedip saçlarının beyazlamasına neden oldu. Sonunda Rotacı, gemiyi acilen gerçekuzaya geçirdi. Kaçış portalının açılması, bilinmeyen saldırganın geri çekilmesini sağlamaya yetti.
languages.original_text: The voidship crew did everything they could to release their vessel from the nightmarish creature's grasp. The bulkheads groaned and snapped, entire chambers depressurised, and screams of people left alone with the warp spawn made vox operators go mad as their hair turned grey. At last the Navigator executed an emergency translation to realspace, and only the opening of the escape portal made the unknown aggressor retreat.
